news.title: New Feature: Car Sales Tax System
news.content:
We've implemented a dynamic tax system for vehicle sales to balance the server economy. The tax is deducted from the seller's final amount.
Key Features:
  • No Limit Sales: Cars can be sold at any price.
  • Seller-Paid Tax: The tax is automatically deducted from the amount the seller receives.
Tax Brackets (based on Gold Bar price):
  • Up to 15,000 GB: No Tax
  • Up to 25,000 GB: 15% Tax
  • Up to 50,000 GB: 20% Tax
  • Up to 80,000 GB: 30% Tax
  • Up to 100,000 GB: 40% Tax
  • Over 100,000 GB: 55% Tax

news.title: Welcome to the New Launcher!
news.content: Welcome to our new, custom-built game launcher! We've designed this to be your one-stop hub for everything related to the server. Please report any bugs on our Discord.
